# CI requirements for ComfyUI-DepthAnythingV3
# Core dependencies

# Vision transformers and model components
torch<=2.8.0
torchvision
einops>=0.6.0
omegaconf
addict

# HuggingFace for model downloading
huggingface_hub>=0.20.0

# Accelerate for efficient model loading
accelerate

# Image processing
# pillow>=10.0.0  # usually already installed with ComfyUI
